testcase.name: SOAP Api testing with Payload File
testcase.system-out: Given url "https://www.w3schools.com/xml/tempconvert.asmx" ................ passed And header Content-Type = "text/xml; charset=utf-8" ....................... passed And request read('../PayloadData/SoapApIData.xml') ........................ passed When soap action "https://www.w3schools.com/xml/CelsiusToFahrenheit" ...... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match responseHeaders['Server'] == ['Microsoft-IIS/7.5'] .............. passed And match responseHeaders['Server'][0] == 'Microsoft-IIS/7.5' ............. passed And match responseType == "xml" ........................................... passed And assert responseTime <= 2000 ........................................... passed
